attributes.action: The law needs to review siblings of same sex sharing rooms in council properties with more than a three year age gap!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live in a two bed council property!I have an eight year old and a thirteen year old, soon to be fourteen,sharing a room! This is`nt good enough!! Children need space to grow and develop in too individuals!
Especially when the oldest is to choose options, and start studying for G.C.S.E`s.
Alot of children grow up and mature alot quicker these days than twenty years ago.
Its not just the maturing quicker,its the fact you cannot guarantee when your children are going to move out,or afford there own property!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
